entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
